turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to place an order at Starbucks an 867 Peachtree Street in Atlanta, Georgia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Grande Caffe Mocha with almond milk and with whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, a grande cafe mocha with almond milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks on 867 Peachtree Street North East in Atlanta, Georgia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you're all set. your coffee will be ready for pick up shortly at the starbucks at 867 Peachtree St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you will receive your receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. I'll look for it.
